# SecCertificate

**Class**

An abstract Core Foundation-type object representing an X.509 certificate.

## Declaration

```swift
class SecCertificate
```

## Overview

A [doc://com.apple.security/documentation/Security/SecCertificate] object for a certificate that is stored in a keychain can be safely cast to a [doc://com.apple.security/documentation/Security/SecKeychainItem] for manipulation as a keychain item. On the other hand, if the [doc://com.apple.security/documentation/Security/SecCertificate] is not stored in a keychain, casting the object to a [doc://com.apple.security/documentation/Security/SecKeychainItem] and passing it to Keychain Services functions returns errors.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
title: SecCertificate
